channel.title: All Registered Polls for the European Parliament
channel.description: All Registered Polls for the European Parliament

item.title: Opinion Poll by 2x1 Komunikacije for CroElecto, 13–21 May 2019 – Seat Projections for the Parties
item.description:
• Hrvatska demokratska zajednica (EPP): 3–4 seats
  • Socijaldemokratska partija Hrvatske (S&D): 2–3 seats
  • Most nezavisnih lista (ECR): 0–1 seats
  • Živi zid (EFDD): 1–2 seats
  • Hrvatska narodna stranka–liberalni demokrati (ALDE): 0 seats
  • Bandić Milan 365–Stranka rada i solidarnosti (*): 0 seats
  • Neovisni za Hrvatsku (EAPN): 0–1 seats
  • Amsterdamska koalicija (ALDE): 0–1 seats

item.title: Opinion Poll by 2x1 Komunikacije for CroElecto, 13–21 May 2019 – Seat Projections for a Selection of Coalitions
item.description: TBD

item.title: Opinion Poll by 2x1 Komunikacije for CroElecto, 13–21 May 2019 – Voting Intentions
item.description:
• Hrvatska demokratska zajednica (EPP): 20.9–27.5%
  • Socijaldemokratska partija Hrvatske (S&D): 18.3–24.6%
  • Most nezavisnih lista (ECR): 5.3–9.2%
  • Živi zid (EFDD): 8.8–13.7%
  • Hrvatska narodna stranka–liberalni demokrati (ALDE): 1.0–3.0%
  • Bandić Milan 365–Stranka rada i solidarnosti (*): 1.6–4.2%
  • Neovisni za Hrvatsku (EAPN): 3.8–7.3%
  • Amsterdamska koalicija (ALDE): 4.3–8.0%

item.title: Opinion Poll by IPSOS PLUS for CroBarometer, 1–20 May 2019 – Voting Intentions
item.description:
• Hrvatska demokratska zajednica (EPP): 27.0–32.7%
  • Socijaldemokratska partija Hrvatske (S&D): 18.8–23.9%
  • Most nezavisnih lista (ECR): 5.0–8.1%
  • Živi zid (EFDD): 6.3–9.7%
  • Bandić Milan 365–Stranka rada i solidarnosti (*): 2.2–4.4%
  • Stranka antikorupcije, razvoja i transparentnosti (*): 2.2–4.4%
  • Neovisni za Hrvatsku (EAPN): 3.7–6.4%
  • Amsterdamska koalicija (ALDE): 5.1–8.2%
  • Hrvatska konzervativna stranka (ECR): 3.3–5.9%
